front.title: IP Transform Policy Distribution using Mobile IP/DIAMETER

abstract.t: The deployment of Mobile IP in a wide area network presents several challenges, not the least of which is how to provide subscribers with secure access to remote private networks. This draft outlines mechanisms whereby the home and visited network may negotiate the use of IP transforms, such as IP Security ESP and AH protocols, on the Mobile IP redirection tunnels. These mechanisms allow for the secure distribution of both keys and policies through a DIAMETER AAA infrastructure, obviating the need for other forms of key distribution or policy negotiation. The mechanisms are extensible to other kinds of IP transforms, such as IP Compression.
